Name: Cooking Trip New Challenge
About the game: Mary and John, as always, were kindly serving the guests in their restaurant when they suddenly saw the mean Gerald Fitzgerald, the owner of the famous restaurant chain, who was buying all promising businesses for his collection. But our characters do not agree to sell their restaurant, even under the threat that they might leave this business forever due to the pressure from restaurant critics. - Several unique restaurants, each with its own cuisine: Grill-bar, Indian cafe, Greek estiatorio - 60 challenging levels of various difficulty - Over 10 various characters Mary and John are going for the exciting journey to work at the famous chefs and bring their skills to the new level! Prove that you deserve to own the restaurant! - A lot of additional missions - Possibility to upgrade your characters and restaurants - Intuitive gaming process for any age - Atmospheric music
